reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 299/08: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITY TO THE MINISTER
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITY TO THE MINISTER

content.content: 1. The authority to make regulations relating to the matters described in paragraphs 3, 13.1, 19, 21, 22 and 37 of subsection 44 (1) of the Act is delegated to the Minister. O. Reg. 299/08, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The authority to make regulations relating to the matters described in paragraphs 3, 13.1, 19, 21, 22 and 37 of subsection 44 (1) of the Act is delegated to the Minister. O. Reg. 299/08, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 299/08, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 299/08, s. 2.
